properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Good news,
good news the
chariot's coming. x3
And a do want you to
leave a me behind. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There, are, silver slippers
in the heavens I know.
(silver slippers
in the heavens I know). x3
And a do want you to
leave a me behind.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There, are, golden crowns
in the heavens I know.
(golden crowns
in the heavens I know). x3
And a do want you to
leave a me behind.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There, are, long white robes
in the heavens I know.
(long white robes
in the heavens I know). x3
And a do want you to
leave a me behind.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There, are, sterling crowns
in the heavens I know.
(sterling crowns
in the heavens I know). x3
And a do want you to
leave a me behind.
